attributes.additional_details:
At the moment, unclaimed estates of people whom have had no Will are listed on an unsolved case list and at the end of the 30 years, the estates are given to the Treasury if it remains unclaimed.

I believe it would be better for the unclaimed estates are given or divided up and given to the Charities.

(If the public agrees then please sign this petition. If this peition gets 100,000 signatures then it is looked at by the government.)
